author: TBR-Development
name: Logger
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog!
Do `[p]help Logger` to get the list of commands and how to use them.
short: Logging cog for use by bot owners
description: Log events to specified channels in the bot owner's guild. Intended for debugging and support purposes.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistantly store data or metadata about users.
